extendedInfo.description: !! Permissions needed to display Ads !!Swamp Defense is a classic tower defense game for any beginners or defensive specialist. Fight your way through a large number of levels with different routes. Unique tower types help you to defeat the Swamp Monsters. Help the family to get rid of the evil breed.The FamilyOld FlintSlows Monsters, minimal DamageWeapon: Denture adhesiveHankHigh damage, shoots trough enemiesWeapon: Electro beamMaggieSplash damage, much damageWeapon: Kitchen ApliancesBusterModerate damage, middle range, rapit fire rateWeapon: Pistol, GunLittle JoeLong range, incredible damage, splash damageWeapon: Rocket launcherFeatures in Fullversion:- 5 different Towers (the family)- 8 types of enemies- more unique Levels with interesting routes- Endless waves (if you are good enough ;) )- unlockable levels- StatisticsLimits of Lite Version:- Wavelimit: 80 waves- Ads includedHow To PlayPut a tower on the edge of the course by tapping with your fingers on the screen. Depending on the available money you can put a weak or strong tower. If you've killed enemies, then you get money. With this money you can improve an existing tower or buy new towers. To improve a tower, tap the desired tower and pick the Button for update (Arrow Up). In this menu you can also sell the tower ($).Help us to improve this game! If you have problems or a crash please report it and write a short email to us with informations about the problems and your hardware and Android version. We canÂ´t reply to user comments so it is not easy to find the problems. Mail to: mail@entwickler-x.deAlso available for iPhone / iPad (iOS) , Windows Phone 7, Xbox 360 and Amiga OS4.1
